age.Description: Participant age at the time of participation (range: 18 to 65; measurement scale: intervale)

hand.Description: Dominant hand, self-reported by participant (measurement scale: nominal)

has_map.Description: Flag indicating whether or not the participant indicated map reading experience through self-report (measurement scale: binary)

has_music.Description: Flag indicating whether or not the participant indicated informal music experience or formal music training through self-report (measurment scale: binary)

level_map.Description: Level of self-reported map reading experience (or 'n/a' if no experience; measurement scale: ordinal)

test_order.Description: Counterbalanced order in which the stimulus sets were presented (measurement scale: nominal)

years_music.Description: Number of years of self-reported music experience (or 'n/a' if no experience; measurement scale: interval)

participant_id.Description: Unique identifier for a participant consisting of the base 'ac' (audio cartography) followed by a two digit number (measurement scale: nominal)
